original_text: So we have come here to tell you this good news. God promised our ancestors that he would do these great things for his people.
korean_text: 우리도 조상들에게 주신 약속을 너희에게 전파하노니

sentences.original_text: to tell you this good news
sentences.korean_translation: 이 좋은 소식을 여러분에게 전하기 위해

sentences.original_text: that he would do these great things
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 위대한 일들을 하실 것을
